peeragogical-action-review.title: Peeragogy Progress PAR 11 (2020-10-27)
peeragogical-action-review.intention-review: Review the Open Future Design pattern and other work.
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: Nice dialogue revisiting the things we did the last 3 meetings.

html:ul.html:li: We’ve recorded a lot of different views!
This whole meeting was based on recording different perspectives
Looking at things with the different patterns helps
Fresh homemade bread from Charlotte Pierce: trust the recipe, that’s the pattern
Thinking some about Handbook and how to go forward

WE NEED TO MANAGE THESE PARS BETTER. Review them next session? – These will benefit other people if we can get a system for e.g. doing Twitter pattern jamming? Direct email, social meeting, phoning people, holding virtual video conferences
What Hermano Cintra was saying about the Wenger circles: get the active circle to engage in a less frequent mode (e.g., monthly, biweekly)
